thread.title: Bob: Drier air and no rain for the next few days
thread.title_full: Bob: Drier air and no rain for the next few days - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Bob Breck
title: Bob: Drier air and no rain for the next few days
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - Yesterday's front brought much drier air that allowed morning lows to dip into the 40s on the North Shore and 50s on the south.
The dry air rapidly heated up during all day sunshine with some areas topping 90. Little change is expected for the next two days before another front arrives Friday night, cooling us some for Saturday and Sunday.
This front will be moisture-starved, so no rain is expected. In fact, we will stay dry until sometime late next week.
Copyright 2015 WVUE.
